tab4.text3: <TextStyle.Red>No pillar spamming, No blocking of resource nodes or dino spawns, No toxicity,No griefing of any kind, pester admin because you lost a dino or kit, full list in discord</>
tab4.text4: <TextStyle.White>Build a decent sized base perimiter using dino gates,  seek help when needed, trade and run content with others, socialise, join discord </>
